title: BIG 3BR, NO FEE, Red line T, beach downtown Seaport. Patio, hwd dw wd
posting_body: BEAUTIFUL apt, spacious living room, BIG EIK (eat-in-kitchen) and high ceilings in a GREAT location.
SS appliances, w/d in basement, gas stove.
3 min walk to the Red line T (Andrew Sq) and a big bus station to Boston and elsewhere.
right next to to I-93, Downtown Boston, Financial District, U-Mass.
Walk to restaurants, parks, tennis & baseball courts, soccer fields.
The huge South Bay Mall is within a short walk: it has Super Stop & Shop, Panera, Bed Bath & Beyond, Target, Home Depot, OfficeMax, Marshalls and TJ Maxx.
Gas stove & dishwasher, storage & laundry in basement.
Utilities extra, around $50 each per month (less in summer, more in winter).
One year lease required, all leasing is done online so its convenient if you're not yet in Boston.
